name: digdugz
text: Well wouldn't that be a frightening development...

name: mc_white
text:
You'd be amazed at how many times this exact thing has happened to me.

Well, hopefully you'd be amazed.

name: tripperday
text: Getting stuck with an inexperienced "bull" of a top?

name: gorrioncita
text: the observer of one year later can only surmise that mc_white's silence was induced by the piercing insight of tripperday's commentary.

name: pascal
text: Oh you KNOW he's a bull.

name: endoftheworld
text: It's wierd because it's kind of a compliment, but I don't think most people would take it as a compliment.

name: epicurus
text: Rod Huggins Assumes that Teodor knows him.

name: professorhazard
text: Rod Huggins warns Teodor to be careful with his delicate rectum, unaware of the fact that Teodor is hung like a cranberry.

name: carlyle
text: THAT'S where I heard the phrase. Thanks.

name: tekende
text: He assumed that Teodor knows him from such titles as Heavy into Rod Huggins.

name: deancain29
text: oh christ

name: zedpower
text: Bear on cat action. Seven kinky!

name: deovalente
text: A comment left by deovalente was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Semiquaver, Lumus, aHatOfPig, nutmeg, Direhaggis, hausea, Frankreich)

name: zedpower
text:
I looked into the furry lifestyle, and the furry lifestyle also looked into me. That kind of creeped me out for a moment, so I crossed my arms and glanced away and tried to make it appear as though I had never looked in the first place.

But we both know I looked. It's really awkward. I haven't spoken to the furry lifestyle since.

name: deovalente
text: A comment left by deovalente was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Semiquaver, atticusonline, Lumus, aHatOfPig, CEOKasen)

name: vweep
text:
It's funny, that no matter how much you try to force it out of your skull layers, that Achewood is indeed a furry comic.

Lames ensue!

name: cagliostro
text: Ensue, dammit! Ensue! Oh man, I hate it when this happens.

name: missbee
text: This is a Good Comment. It makes me want to be friends with you.

name: deovalente
text: Then let us hereby be friends.

name: missbee
text: Well, I was replying to zedpower, but more friends are always great so: AWESOME. Friendship initiated.

name: deovalente
text: Being an idiot, I noticed this after posting the comment, but then I figured hey, maybe I'll get a friend anyway.  Sup friend.

name: missbee
text: Haha. Nothin' friend. You?

name: deovalente
text: Not much, just chilling.  I miss you.  We never talk anymore.  How's your family?  Tell them I'm sorry I couldn't make it over for Thanksgiving like I promised.

name: gouldgonewild
text: Why does everyone else get a friend

name: missbee
text: You know what? I will allow you to be my friend. There you go.

name: missbee
text: They're doing fine, but they WERE disappointed. You were supposed to bring the stuffing!

name: deovalente
text: I was planning on surprising everybody for the Fourth of July.  I'll bring sparklers.

name: missbee
text: This is acceptable. I don't think Rob's gonna be there though :/

name: deovalente
text: Rob and I...never really got along.  I mean, I know everybody was looking forward to seeing him and all...

name: zedpower
text:
As much as I enjoy being friends with people in general, I'm afraid the topic at hand would cause me to gain the reputation of a man who likes getting it on with bees.

Oh, wait, that's impossible. Never mind then. Friends! Woo!

name: missbee
text: Woo!

name: vweep
text:
I'm... I'm late to the friendship...

/cut

name: missbee
text: The friendship is still open!

name: poodlelucy
text: excellent avatar-comment synergy.

name: professorhazard
text: Dey show dem dis real-ly kin-ky an-i-mal por-nog-ra-phy, like two cats and a dog, or a bat and a pig.

name: stop
text: I JUST got, after more than 2 years, that Rod calls Teodor "cubby" because he's a bear... I'm not that bright.

text: Aw, that's cute. I always read it as 'chubby'.

text: All veteran adult film actors in Achewood seem to be sporting a beard.

name: boboctiberius
text: I thought the last panel said "Chubby", and I thought that was a pretty dick thing for Rod Huggins to say.
